description: The Weeping Cedar of Lebanon is an amazing plant species, full of character and grace. It's structure is slim, elegant in shape and content, swaying gently in the wind. Growing up to 30 feet, the branches of the Weeping Cedar of Lebanon twist and turn in dramatic curves, making for an eye-catching specimen. The thin foliage of its delicate needles is a light glaucous green, adding a pleasant canvas to any outdoor area. It's sure to draw everyone's attention and provide you with a unique and stunning piece of nature to admire.
